omi::Attribute::Storage Class Referenceabstract

The internal storage class defines how the contents of the attribute will be stored. More...

 The current reference count of the storage.
 
std::size_t m_immutable_ref_count
 The number of immutable attributes that have references to this storage.
 

Detailed Description

The internal storage class defines how the contents of the attribute will be stored.

Implementation of any sub-attribute types need to implement a derived storage class.
